languages.text: "Благодарю за поистине щедрый дар! Вы не пожалеете — я позабочусь, чтобы ваши астропаты послужили процветанию Януса". {n}Она одаривает хормейстера лучезарной улыбкой.{/n} "Поверьте, вашим подчиненным очень повезло. Они будут жить в моем дворце и ни в чем не испытывать нужды".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю за поистине щедрый дар! Вы не пожалеете — я позабочусь, чтобы ваши астропаты послужили процветанию Януса". {n}Она одаривает хормейстера лучезарной улыбкой.{/n} "Поверьте, вашим подчиненным очень повезло. Они будут жить в моем дворце и ни в чем не испытывать нужды".

languages.text: "Thank you for this truly generous gift. You will not regret it — I will ensure that your Astropaths work for the prosperity of Janus." {n}She bestows a radiant smile upon the Choirmaster.{/n} "I assure you, your subordinates are fortunate indeed. They shall live in my palace, where they will want for nothing."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за поистине щедрый дар! They shall live in my palace, where they will want for nothing."

languages.text: «Le agradezco este generoso regalo. No se arrepentirá: me aseguraré de que sus Astrópatas se entreguen a la prosperidad de Janus». {n}Dedica una sonrisa radiante al maestro del Coro.{/n} «Le aseguro que a sus subordinados les espera un destino envidiable. Vivirán en mi palacio, donde recibirán todo lo que deseen».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this truly generous gift. You will not regret it — I will ensure that your Astropaths work for the prosperity of Janus." {n}She bestows a radiant smile upon the Choirmaster.{/n} "I assure you, your subordinates are fortunate indeed. They shall live in my palace, where they will want for nothing."

languages.text: 「本当に寛大な贈り物をありがとうございます。後悔はさせません。陛下の感応通信官がヤヌスの繁栄のために役立つことを保証いたしましょう」{n}彼女はクワイアーマスターへと晴れやかな笑顔を向ける。{/n}「ご安心ください、あなたの部下たちは実に幸運です。彼らは私の宮殿に住まい、何一つ不自由することはないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this truly generous gift. You will not regret it — I will ensure that your Astropaths work for the prosperity of Janus." {n}She bestows a radiant smile upon the Choirmaster.{/n} "I assure you, your subordinates are fortunate indeed. They shall live in my palace, where they will want for nothing."

languages.text: “谢谢您如此慷慨的礼物。您是绝对不会后悔的，我会确保您的星语者会为了加努斯的繁荣而努力工作。”{n}维丝坦萨对唱诗大师露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}“我可以向你保证，被我选中的下属都会是幸运儿。他们会住在我的宫殿里，过着衣食无忧的生活。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this truly generous gift. You will not regret it — I will ensure that your Astropaths work for the prosperity of Janus." {n}She bestows a radiant smile upon the Choirmaster.{/n} "I assure you, your subordinates are fortunate indeed. They shall live in my palace, where they will want for nothing."

languages.text: "Danke für dieses wirklich großzügige Geschenk. Ihr werdet es nicht bereuen ... ich versichere Euch, dass Eure Astropathen für das Wohl von Janus arbeiten." {n}Sie schenkt dem Chormeister ein strahlendes Lächeln.{/n} "Ich versichere Euch, Eure Untergebenen können sich in der Tat glücklich schätzen. Sie werden in meinem Palast leben und es wird ihnen an nichts mangeln."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this truly generous gift. You will not regret it — I will ensure that your Astropaths work for the prosperity of Janus." {n}She bestows a radiant smile upon the Choirmaster.{/n} "I assure you, your subordinates are fortunate indeed. They shall live in my palace, where they will want for nothing."

languages.text: « Merci pour ce cadeau des plus généreux. Vous ne le regretterez pas. Je vais mettre vos astropathes au service de la prospérité de Janus. » {n}Elle adresse un sourire radieux au maître de chœur.{/n} « Je peux vous assurer que vos subordonnés seront traités avec tous les égards. Ils vivront au sein même de mon palais, où ils ne manqueront de rien. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this truly generous gift. You will not regret it — I will ensure that your Astropaths work for the prosperity of Janus." {n}She bestows a radiant smile upon the Choirmaster.{/n} "I assure you, your subordinates are fortunate indeed. They shall live in my palace, where they will want for nothing."

languages.text: "Son derece cömert hediyeniz için teşekkür ederim. Pişman olmayacaksınız... Astropatlarınızın Janus'un refahı için çalışmalarını sağlayacağım." {n}Koro Şefi'ne göz alıcı bir gülümseme bahşediyor.{/n} "Seni temin ederim ki astların hakikaten de şanslılar. Sarayımda yaşayacaklar ve orada yedikleri önlerinde, yemedikleri arkalarında kalacak."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this truly generous gift. You will not regret it — I will ensure that your Astropaths work for the prosperity of Janus." {n}She bestows a radiant smile upon the Choirmaster.{/n} "I assure you, your subordinates are fortunate indeed. They shall live in my palace, where they will want for nothing."
